<all_urls>.description: Can read and modify all data on all websites you visit
<all_urls>.explanation: This extension has full access to every website. It can read your passwords, see your browsing activity, and modify page content.

webRequestBlocking.description: Can intercept, block, and modify network requests
webRequestBlocking.explanation: This extension can see and modify all network traffic, including potentially sensitive data sent to websites.

debugger.explanation: This is a very powerful permission that allows inspecting and controlling other tabs. Only trusted developer tools should have this.

nativeMessaging.description: Can communicate with programs installed on your computer
nativeMessaging.explanation: This extension can send and receive data from native applications, potentially allowing it to execute code outside the browser.

webRequest.explanation: This extension can see URLs and metadata for all network requests, though it cannot modify them without webRequestBlocking.

cookies.explanation: This extension can access your cookies, which could be used to impersonate your logged-in sessions on websites.

proxy.description: Can route traffic through proxy servers
proxy.explanation: This extension can redirect your network traffic through external servers, potentially exposing your browsing data.

privacy.explanation: This extension can modify your browser's privacy settings, such as Do Not Track and safe browsing protection.

management.explanation: This extension can enable, disable, or uninstall other extensions, which could be used to disable security tools.

downloads.description: Can initiate downloads and access download history
downloads.explanation: This extension can download files to your computer and see your download history.

history.explanation: This extension can see which websites you've visited, which is a privacy concern but limited security risk.

tabs.explanation: This extension can see the URLs and titles of your open tabs, which may reveal your browsing activity.

bookmarks.explanation: This extension can access your bookmarks, which is a minor privacy concern.

storage.explanation: This is a standard permission that allows the extension to save its settings and data.

alarms.explanation: This is a standard permission for running periodic background tasks.

notifications.explanation: This is a standard permission for displaying desktop notifications.

contextMenus.explanation: This is a standard permission for adding items to the browser's context menu.

activeTab.description: Can access current tab when clicked
activeTab.explanation: This extension can only access the current tab when you explicitly click on it. This is much safer than broad tab access.

normal.label: Chrome Web Store
normal.description: Installed from the official Chrome Web Store

sideload.label: Sideloaded
sideload.description: Installed from outside the Chrome Web Store

admin.label: Enterprise Policy
admin.description: Installed by your organization's IT policy

other.label: Unknown Source
other.description: Installation source could not be determined

high.label: High Risk
high.description: This extension has permissions that could pose significant security or privacy risks.

medium.label: Medium Risk
medium.description: This extension has some permissions that warrant attention.

low.label: Low Risk
low.description: This extension has minimal permissions and poses low risk.
